titles.title: Creating Reliability for Our Producers Act
CROP Act
To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to support crop insurance for specialty crops, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 3/19/2013--Introduced. Creating Reliability for Our Producers Act or CROP Act - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to revise crop insurance provisions regarding approval of advance payments for a portion of specialty crop research and development costs.
